# identifier

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier for this account.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var identifier: NSString! { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.accounts/documentation/Accounts/ACAccountStore/account(withIdentifier:)] method to get an account with the specified identifier.

## Accessing Properties

- **accountDescription**: A human-readable description of the account.
- **accountType**: The type of service account.
- **credential**: The credential used to authenticate the user of this account.
- **username**: The username for this account.
- **userFullName**: The full name associated with the user account.
